properties.description: Joined data of 3 files and saved in db table

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DeptId as string,
		Deptname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourcedept
source(output(
		LocId as string,
		Locname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceLoc
source(output(
		EmpId as string,
		Empname as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as string,
		DeptId as string,
		LocId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceEmp
sourceEmp, sourcedept join(sourceEmp@DeptId == sourcedept@DeptId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmpDept
JoinEmpDept select(mapColumn(
		EmpId,
		Empname,
		Gender,
		Salary,
		Deptname,
		LocId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectcolumns
Selectcolumns, sourceLoc join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == sourceLoc@LocId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmpLoc
